hibernate-mapping.query: from Hearings hs where hs.legalcase.id=? ORDER BY hearingDate desc
from Hearings hs where hs.legalcase=? and hs.hearingDate=?
from Hearings hs where hs.legalcase=? and hs.hearingDate=? and hs.id!=?
from Hearings hs where hs.legalcase=? and hs.hearingDate>?
from Hearings hs where hs.legalcase=? and hs.hearingDate>? and hs.id!=?
from Hearings hs where hs.legalcase.lcnumber=? ORDER BY hearingDate desc
from Hearings hs where hs.hearingDate=? and (hs.legalcase.nextDate is null or hs.legalcase.nextDate!=?)
